tool.name: histories
tool.command:
parsec histories get_histories
#if $history_id: --history_id "$history_id" #end if #if $name: --name "$name" #end if ## UNKNOWN deleted
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: history_id
param.label: history_id
param.help: Encoded history ID to filter on

param.name: name
param.label: name
param.help: Name of history to filter on

tool.help: Get all histories or filter the specific one(s) via the provided ``name`` or ``history_id``. Provide only one argument, ``name`` or ``history_id``, but not both.
